data.quote: The price of freedom is high, it always has been. And it’s a price I’m willing to pay. And if I’m the only one, then so be it. But I’m willing to bet I’m not.
data.author: Captain America

data.quote: Heroes are made by the paths they choose, not the powers they are graced with.
data.author: Iron Man

data.quote: Greatness is being great when greatness is the minimal amount required for success
data.author: Thor

data.quote: In times of crisis the wise build bridges, while the foolish build barriers.
data.author: Black Panther

data.quote: There was an idea called the Avengers Initiative. The idea was to bring together a group of remarkable people so they could become something more. See if they could work together when we needed them to fight the battles we never could.
data.author: Nick Fury

data.quote: I know what it’s like to lose. To feel so desperately that you’re right, yet to fail nonetheless. Dread it. Run from it. Destiny still arrives. Or should I say, I have.
data.author: Thanos

data.quote: With great power comes great responsibilty.
data.author: Stan Lee
